headline: Top Research Reports for Exxon Mobil, Bristol-Myers Squibb & Chubb
summary: Today's Research Daily features new research reports on 16 major stocks, including Exxon Mobil Corporation (XOM), Bristol-Myers Squibb Company (BMY) and Chubb Limited (CB), as well as a micro-cap stock Hamilton Beach Brands Holding Company (HBB).

headline: Freeport-McMoRan (NYSE:FCX) Affirms US$0.15 Dividend Amidst Price Rise (3% Over Last Month)
summary: Freeport-McMoRan (NYSE:FCX) recently affirmed a cash dividend of $0.15 per share, integrating a base and variable payout structure that aligns with its performance-based framework. This move highlights the company's commitment to returning value to shareholders against a backdrop of market volatility. Over the last month, FCX shares rose 3%, possibly buoyed by the dividend announcement. Despite broader market fluctuations, with major indexes like the S&P 500 recovering from steep losses...

headline: An American Mine Still Has Millions of Tons of Copper, If Companies Can Get to It

headline: TCW Relative Value Large Cap Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: The Fed lowered rates by 25 bps at its December meeting but forecasted fewer cuts (two versus four) in 2025 due to inflation concerns. Read more here.
